'''1.16.1.04''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for PlayStation 4 on July 16, 2020 to improve stability in the game. <ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360045602971|title=Minecraft - 1.16.1 (Bedrock)|date=July 16, 2020}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Improved stability in the game.
